Name: El Obsequio (The Gift)
Ingredients: 60 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by António Saldanha de Oliveira at Curfew, Copenhagen, Demark. Inspiration : “El Obsequio represents a gesture of gratitude - inspired by a perfume bottle created by the Bacardí family in 1888 to be gifted to clients, business partners and company collaborators – it is my translation of that perfume into a legacy cocktail.”
Nutrition: One serving of El Obsequio (The Gift) contains 190 calories
